channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-23847] Extracting hive-parser module broke exec jar upload in tez
item.description:

item.summary: Extracting hive-parser module broke exec jar upload in tez

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
seems like patch I've merged the patch around a month ago - but I left this ticket open by mistake...
thank you asinkovits for fixing this!
